tasks.label: Prepare OpenMask3D Scene (my_desk)
tasks.detail: Prepare OpenMask3D scene for my_desk scan

tasks.label: Launch OpenMask3D Server (GPU)
tasks.command: source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate spot_env && docker pull craiden/openmask:v1.0 && docker run -p 5001:5001 --gpus all -it craiden/openmask:v1.0 bash -lc "python3 app.py"
tasks.detail: Pull the OpenMask3D image and start the segmentation server with GPU acceleration. Requires NVIDIA Container Toolkit (run 'Check GPU Docker Setup' first).

tasks.label: Run Text Segment 3D (my_desk object_name)
tasks.command: DISPLAY=:77 XAUTHORITY=$HOME/.Xauthority xterm -hold -e "bash -lc 'source ~/miniconda3/bin/activate spot_env && python -m scripts.temp_scripts.text_segment_3d --item \"laptop\" --scan-name my_desk'" &
tasks.detail: Run the text_segment_3d temp script for the object_name on the my_desk scan using display :77.
